SCRIPT.MSCRI: !---------------------Logging Connection Details------------------------------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Database name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_BIZ_DB_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Database server instance name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_BIZ_DB_INSTANCE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Database server name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_BIZ_DB_SRV_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port number" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_BIZ_PORT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM

DOCU_Docu.DOC: Common AE script to log Connection details parameters.
